long_description: Designed specifically for use with an iPad or tablet computer, the STM Linear iPad shoulder bag keeps your hands free while on the go by providing snug and secure storage for your favorite device. Softly-lined dedicated laptop pocket is surrounded in high-density padding for ultimate protection. Tough, durable polyester fabric stands up to constant use. Front flap stays securely in place with a quick-release buckle; small zip pocket on flap for quick-access items. Softly-lined pockets underneath flap store additional accessories. Adjustable, padded shoulder strap on the STM Linear shoulder bag provides comfortable, hands-free carrying option. Luggage pass-through sleeve slides over rolling luggage pull handle for easy companion wheeling. Reflective tab enhances nighttime visibility.
short_description: Designed specifically for use with an iPad or tablet computer, the STM Linear iPad shoulder bag keeps your hands free while on the go by providing snug and secure storage for your favorite device.
